Description.val: MISSION AND DESCRIPTION: The MILCON Collateral Equipment line item procures collateral equipment for Special Operations Forces military construction facilities. No associated RDT&E funds.

Justification.val: FY 2013 PROGRAM JUSTIFICATION: Provides information technology equipment, video monitoring, targeting systems and other equipment above the Operation and Maintenance threshold of $250 thousand, as well as items that are centrally managed.
